participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Caring, humorous, and dedicated; loves to inspire others and share knowledge.
participant_1.background: I enjoy spending time with my pets in the cold weather. My days are spent working, exercising, and trying to balance my work and family life. This past summer I hiked the Appalachian Trail. I love to tell jokes. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Easygoing, creative, and down-to-earth; loves music and film culture.
participant_2.background: I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea. I am a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films. I enjoyed the peace and quiet of my cabin on the lake. I am slightly overweight because I spend too much time watching television and not enough time exercising. I am interested in producing music.

content.text: Not much, just working on a project. What about you?
I'm just relaxing and watching some TV. What kind of project are you working on?
I'm working on a lesson plan for my students. I teach middle school English.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to be a teacher. What's your favorite part about it?
I love getting to interact with the students and help them learn. It's really rewarding when you see them make progress.
That's awesome! I think it would be really cool to make a difference in someone's life.
It is! And it's also really fun to see the excitement on their faces when they learn something new.
I bet! What's your least favorite part about teaching?
I think the paperwork is the worst part. It's so time consuming and it's not always the most interesting thing to do.
Yeah, I can imagine. But it's probably worth it if you love your job.
It is! I really do love teaching. It's the best job in the world.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Well, it sounds like you're doing a great job.
